website_summaries.verdict: With natural ingredients and no harsh chemicals, this versatile treatment is safe to use and effective for most consumers with mild to moderate moles, tags, and warts.
pros: Made with natural, plant-sourced ingredients that safely remove most moles, skin tags, and warts
only produces a mild stinging sensation for some
Paste consistency is easy to control
Kit includes bandages, alcohol swaps, exfoliator, and vitamin cream
cons: Takes longer to work than some products, up to three weeks for best results
May not remove large moles or tags
Rare reports of damaged packaging upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: This is the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t my first rodeo. I’ve used blood root paste for years and have sourced the product from several providers. By far, Oneness Labs’ Homeopathic Bloodroot Paste is the best I’ve used. The texture is smooth making it easy to place. The ingredients are blended for maximum effectiveness. And, the provider, Oneness goes the extra mile by providing detailed instructions, plus the bandaids, swabs and healing cream needed for a complete treatment package. It all sends a message that this company wants to do things right. Well done, Oneness
customer_reviews.author: Goldin

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Comes with a whole set up.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I've found that actually works as advertised. The jar comes with a set of tools to help apply the paste and keep it covered, which is super helpful. I've used it on about half a dozen moles so far, and I'm actually pretty surprised at how well it removes them. There's no markings afterwards like I've experienced with other methods. The jar itself is pretty small but a little goes a long way so it seems like it'll last a long time. Super happy with this purchase, and the price is great when compared to what else is out there and how effective it is.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: A Natural Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Looooove this stuff! Simply follow the instructions and it will do its magic. So happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Colette O.

customer_reviews.title: This works if you follow the directions.
customer_reviews.text: Mole and tag removal. I waited awhile to review this product. It did work after 2 treatments. The directions are clear. I am very pleased I bought the product.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that really works!
customer_reviews.text: After trying so many products, I was esceptical about a wart or tag remover that really works. I really wanted to get rid of an ugly skin tag in my neck and I finally found something that really accomplish what advertises. I love that includes absolutely everything you need without going through your cabinets and look for other necessary items for the treatment. I’m happy with the final result.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Sue White

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to trying.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail today. Shipping was faster than I thought it would be. I haven’t tried it yet. Looks like everything was included. Jar is 1 ounce. It does say you need to use the included nail file and place a warm cloth on the mole before you use the cream .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: it DOES turn the area black , and DOES burn surrounding skin as advised, but only barely dried up one small tag after about 2 weeks--other three tags remained the same after the black discoloration left. Lots of expense, work, and discomfort for minimal benefit. I support homeopathic methods and bloodroot, but would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Nordland

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I got this, hoping it would work because it is natural. What I got was just a $36 jar of dried out stuff. I didn't even get all of the little go-withs that are listed, so I didn't try it out right away. It took a couple of weeks, after I found everything I needed and it was such a mess. It is so powdery that it doesn't even stick to the tag. I ended up with a bloody, infected mess that I had to get cleared up. I ended up buying the Tag Band and that works like a charm!!!! I feel totally ripped off, but I guess it worked for some people. I don't know how, though.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and really works. I have successfully removed multiple moles that I thought I was stuck with forever, two Of them on my face. I look like a different person And I cannot believe when I look in the mirror that they are gone. They did take a week but I believe that’s because I was not reapplying it for the first few days. Once I figured that out, they quickly cane off. It’s like a dream. I’m SO happy.
customer_reviews.author: Family Seven

customer_reviews.title: Instruction and Secure Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure the product is safe to use because the product top was cracked on the side when it arrived. Also, the product didn’t come with instruction. I am still very interested in using the product if we can quickly resolve my concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow- this really works. I had a mole on my face that I’ve hated for years. I was a little skeptical, but bought this based on the reviews. I did two treatments, each overnight (10-12 hours). The paste turned my mole into a scan after the first treatment, but I did one more just in case. I made sure to put Correct-X (DoTerra’s neosporin) every couple of hours. The scab came off after 3 days. I do have a slight indent, but the mole is GONE. I’m applying Correct-X every couple of hours to help heal the skin. I’m super impressed and a little shocked that it worked!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Go to your dermatologist first. If it’s not a concern to them then use this stuff. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have used another product with one of the main ingredients for years to handle all kinds of skin issues. I bought this one because of the added ingredients which I know are beneficial in helping to create healthy skin. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate website description
customer_reviews.text: The website description is inaccurate. It says "Kit contains Bloodroot cream, Alcohol swabs, Bandaids, Exfoliator & Vitamin Healing Cream" however only Bloodroot was delivered the 2 times i purchased. total rip-off
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, old product .
customer_reviews.text: Bought after reading reviews . The product arrived with dry cream . It looked old and powdery couldn’t even apply . Now have to go through the hassle of returning this small package of old dry product to get a refund .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is some kind of acid and it took it away.
customer_reviews.text: Follow directions, and for me it is doing what was promoted it said. I'm in process of healing. Seems to have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work for me
customer_reviews.text: My friend suggested that I try a natural product for skin tags I have. I tried a few products from the internet and none of them worked. At first, I wasn’t sure if it was working but after a few days I could see it getting smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Luiza

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: There was a little pain and discomfort, but the product worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: To follow directions.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell very good but works well. Does sting a little when you apply it to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nana64

customer_reviews.title: To get Rid of these Moles.
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell you yet,been using the Product for about a week.you can feel the Burning Sensation and a Couple of Moles came off so Far.
customer_reviews.author: A.c.Washington

customer_reviews.title: Seeing great results
customer_reviews.text: I am surprisingly shocked that this is working so we'll! My scab has not fallen off yet, and it is a long process, but it is smaller every day! It was a large, raised mole. When they are that large, it will take longer. I followed all directions and am seeing great results. I will use again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Bloodroot worked for removal of my skin tag!
customer_reviews.text: I've used bloodroot in the past for a mole removal. This product worked well for the skin tag on my arm. Seems more effective than Thuja oil and results are quicker. Once the scab formed a day after bloodroot application, I rubbed pure vitamin E oil and vitamin C on the scab over the next 2 days. This helps with the healing process and clears up the skin so there's minimal discoloration. On day 3, the scab fell off and no more skin tag!
customer_reviews.author: JesQ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Any type of a skin growth it will attack...may take 3 or 4 times or more depending upon the growth. Has some pain for up to 45 minutes when it starts tapering off. Unless you are a professional model, do not worry about any scar or waiting for weeks to tear it off, just soak the are a couple times a day with DMSO and it will heal just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on a skin tag and on an age spot. The instructions say that only one application is needed but I found that I needed two (2 days). I cleaned with alcohol before applying each time. Also did the scratching of the area before applying. I forgot to use the hot rag to open the pores. It worked as advertised. The two areas scabbed over and eventually fell off. I have no scarring and my skin is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kesava

customer_reviews.title: So far it works
customer_reviews.text: So far this product works. I used it for a mole that has been on my neck since forever that made me insecure. It’s pretty easy to use. However it’s leaving a scar which was to be expected. Since it’s not done healing I’m not 100% sure it completely removed it but it looks like it has. I’ll be sure to update my review if need be
customer_reviews.author: Michelleeee

customer_reviews.title: No pamphlet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February of this year. Just getting around to using this. There is no instructions in th package. It's past the return date
customer_reviews.author: E J

customer_reviews.title: Works fabulously
customer_reviews.text: This worked fabulously on my skin tags. Tried the rubber band method to no avail do since the reviews on this product were so good thought I’d try for myself. Perfect results.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L.

customer_reviews.title: Removes entire mole, root and all!
customer_reviews.text: It works quickly and I removed two large moles . They shrank up and fell out. Now for the skin tags...
customer_reviews.author: Ezana A Zewede

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: So this is the real deal. The real deal! I had grown these skin tags on my nose about 7 years ago. I dreaded them!! People thought they were moles but they developed after trying to pop pimples. This is a game changer I’m so grateful. I’m sharing with all my family and close friends.
customer_reviews.author: theyoungprofessional

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy product to use!
customer_reviews.text: This device worked just as advertised. I was trying to look for something that would remove it other than freezing it off and this worked so well! I was worried that it would hurt, but the application doesn’t hurt at all. I am so thankful for this product, because it is cheap and and it gets rid of an embarrassing problem that I’ve had for years. Easily worth 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Wolansky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to try out this mole remover for a while, and it has cleared up the majority of moles on my face and body. Not only has Homeopathic mole remover improved my self confidence significantly, it is also the most effective mole removing product I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: opalx97

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Mole!
customer_reviews.text: This mole remover was such a great purchase. I was worried that it would be painful and didnt know if it was going to work or not. I'm so happy because my giant mole that I have lived with for 27 years on my face is now gone! A new beautiful face. I reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I applied the product twice on Wednesday, in the morning and in the evening, then once on Thursday evening and once on Friday evening. Then I noticed that the tag was drying out. When it fell off completely, there was new skin. I tried a lot of skin tags removers and this one looks like the most effective over the counter remover.
customer_reviews.author: NoFur

customer_reviews.title: Works on warts
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple different options such as creams and band aid, I decided to try this. It stings a little but it’s bearable. After using it a few times it helped remove a wart I had gotten while doing some landscaping and digging.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

product_meta.title: Homeopathic Mole and Skin Tag Remover - Neck Tag Mole Removal Cream (1 oz.) All Natural Herbal Ingredients with Bloodroot, Galangal Root & Graviola for Optimal Effect
product_meta.description:
Fully safe and manufactured in GMP certified facilities - Easy-to-follow Instructions Included



And, here’s why our product works:

Bloodroot is an all-natural and powerful antioxidant and anti-inflammatory root compound which aids in extracting the unwanted tag from the root.
Galangal Root enhances blood circulation, heals skin burns and reduces the size of lumps or growths under the skin.
Chaparral Root is used in Ayurvada to alleviate rheumatic pain and chronic skin disorders.
Dulcamara is known for its natural antibacterial properties commonly used for skin therapy treatment.
Thuja Occidentalis relieves painful joint and muscle tension.
Calcarea Carbonica treats a variety of skin disorders such as acne and ringworm. Antimonium Crudum clears unsightly and irritating skin and nail conditions such as warts and moles.
Glycerin prevents scarring and keeps skin moisturized.



This powerful combination of wholesome, time tested ingredients makes the world's best skin tag, wart and mole remover. And, a little goes a long way, so it’s very cost effective.


We back it with our 100% money back guarantee and all we ask is that you use it as instructed. Think about it, this purchase may save you thousands on unnecessary surgery and doctor visits.


Safety Warning: Follow the instructions carefully. Be cautious in your application process.
feature_bullets: High Quality Ingredients With your health and safety in mind, we ensure that every batch surpasses our stringent standards of quality. We are proud to be made in GMP-certified facilities.
Homeopathic Natural Ingredients - Sanguinaria Canadensis, Chaparral root, Galangal root, Thuja Occidentalis, Dulcamara, Calcarea Carbonica, Antimonium Crudum, Zinc Chloride
Neck Tag Remover Skin Mole Remover Wart Remover Smoothes Skin
Paste May Cause Mild Stinging Sensation - This is Completely Normal
Skin Tags should naturally fall off within 1 to 3 weeks
